doc:
Ian Reddington https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ian_Reddington 0 Ian Reddington (born 25 September 1957) is an English actor with many stage and television credits since the early 1980s. He became widely known for television roles such as the Chief Clown in the Doctor Who serial The Greatest Show in the Galaxy, Richard Cole in EastEnders and Vernon Tomlin in Coronation Street. Ian_Reddington ( born 25_September_1957 ) is an_English_actor with many_stage_and_television_credits since the_early_1980s . He became_widely_known for television_roles such_as the_Chief_Clown in the_Doctor Who_serial The_Greatest_Show in the_Galaxy , Richard_Cole in EastEnders and Vernon_Tomlin in Coronation_Street .
